GCDCalculator.summary: The GCDCalculator class. Contains methods for calculating the Gratest Common Divisor.

CalculateTwoInt.summary: Calculates the Gratest Common Divisor of two specified integers.
CalculateTwoInt.returns: The Greatest Common Divisor of the specified integers.

CalculateWithTime.summary: Calculates the Gratest Common Divisor of two specified integers and stores the consumed time into output parameter.
CalculateWithTime.param: The time consumed by the calculation.
CalculateWithTime.returns: The Greatest Common Divisor of the specified integers.

CalculateThreeInt.summary: Calculates the Gratest Common Divisor of three specified integers.
CalculateThreeInt.returns: The Greatest Common Divisor of the specified integers.

CalculateFourInt.summary: Calculates the Gratest Common Divisor of four specified integers.
CalculateFourInt.returns: The Greatest Common Divisor of the specified integers.

CalculateFiveInt.summary: Calculates the Gratest Common Divisor of five specified integers.
CalculateFiveInt.returns: The Greatest Common Divisor of the specified integers.

CalculateBinWithTime.summary: Calculates the Gratest Common Divisor of two specified integers using binary algorythm.
CalculateBinWithTime.param: The time consumed by the calculation.
CalculateBinWithTime.returns: The Greatest Common Divisor of the specified integers.

GetHistogram.summary: Prepares the obtained time of operations for a histogram.
GetHistogram.returns: The dictionary of the time consumed by both methods.
